EmailTemplate.description: Letting partners know we are testifying against eversource
EmailTemplate.name: 18-01 BW Eversource Testimony
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Policy Action Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We've got your back.
Dear {!Contact.Name},
BlueWave's Managing Director, Mark Sylvia, will be testifying at 1pm today before the Joint Committee on Telecomm, Utilities and Energy against the Eversource MMC (monthly minimum reliability contribution), which is set to increase the cost of solar systems for residential customers.
Our testimony will be available on our website this afternoon.
For the latest BlueWave updates, please follow us on social media using the links below.
If you would like to join BlueWave for future solar policy action, please reach out directly to your BlueWave partner.
Thank you for your work to make Solar for Everyone, Everywhere a reality!
- All of us here at BlueWave
